title: How Excited Are We For The Return of G4? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.12.21
description:
Laura Kate Dale joins Tim to discuss the return of G4 to TV, a potential Fortnite movie, and even more game TV/Movie adaptations! 

Follow Laura at https://twitter.com/LaurakBuzz and check out her new book at https://unbound.com/books/whale/

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
Check Laura’s book:
https://unbound.com/books/whale/
00:03:12 - Housekeeping
If that’s not enough for Kinda Funny feature content, The Blessing Show returns this week as a Youtube premiere. Tune in on Thursday at 9am PT on Youtube.com/kindafunnygames as we break down what’s up in a very loopy episode.
Also, in case you missed it, the first episode of The Arkham Files with Barrett premiered yesterday on YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames. The first episode is all about how Batman: Arkham Asylum is still a masterclass in design to this day. Episode 2 premieres this Monday, October 18th, and it’s all about how Arkham City truly makes you feel like Batman. AND, to celebrate Arkham City’s 10th anniversary on the 18th, Barrett and Mike are streaming the entire game all day, starting after Games Daily, right here on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames!
If that’s not enough for Kinda Funny feature content, The Blessing Show returns this week as a Youtube premiere. Tune in on Thursday at 9am PT on Youtube.com/kindafunnygames as we break down what’s up in a very loopy episode.
Today right after KFGD we are doing our Scream Trailer Reaction on Twitch.tv/kindafunnygames we are partnering with Nvidia Geforce as Andy, Mike, and Nick will be playing Back 4 Blood showing off DLSS and all that dope RTX tech
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Pranksy & Black Jackl
The Roper Report  -
00:05:00 - G4 Is Officially Relaunching on November 16th, 2021 (g4tv.com)
00:21:30 - Epic Games Is Reportedly Considering Makinga Fortnite Movie (Adele Ankers at IGN)
00:28:31 - Sable and Other Games from Publisher Raw Fury to Be Adapted for Film and TV (Adam Bankhurst at IGN)
00:39:04 - Ad
00:42:17 - Pokemon Legends Arceus Won’t Actually Be An Open-World Game (Liam Doolan at Nintendo Life)
00:49:15 - Out today
00:55:18 - Squad Up:Jackson (Xbox and PS) - Thiastor
00:56:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Andy
